thread.title: Bradley Cooper rolls up his sleeves for 'Burnt'
thread.title_full: Bradley Cooper rolls up his sleeves for 'Burnt'

title: Bradley Cooper rolls up his sleeves for 'Burnt'
text:
> Entertainment Bradley Cooper rolls up his sleeves for 'Burnt' This photo provided by The Weinstein Company, shows Bradley Cooper as Adam Jones, in a scene from the film, "Burnt." The movie opens in U.S. theaters on Oct. 30. (Alex Bailey/The Weinstein Company via AP) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
